definition: Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: New, clean and comfortable for a very good price in HCMC.
sentences.chinese: 在胡志明市合適的價格可以享受到全新，乾淨和舒適。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Ho Chi Minh City on CX.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至胡志明市機票。

sentences.english: Best Chinese Seafood & Hotpot restaurant in New Saigon City Centre Phu My Hung area.
sentences.chinese: 胡志明市新城區富美興最好的中餐海鮮火鍋酒家。

sentences.english: I a heading back to Los Angeles today at around 4pm here in HoChiMinh City.
sentences.chinese: 我今天下午4點從胡志明市回到了洛杉磯。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Siem Reap on VN.
sentences.chinese: 越南航空公司來回胡志明市至暹粒機票。

sentences.english: The incident in photos shot by Binh Minh 02's guardian ships.
sentences.chinese: 在胡志明市的平陽02的守護船拍攝照片的事件。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Ho Chi Minh City on VN.
sentences.chinese: 越南航空公司來回香港至胡志明市機票。

sentences.english: Roundtrip economy class air ticket for HKG and Ho Chi Minh City on Cathay Pacific Airways.
sentences.chinese: 國泰航空公司來回香港至胡志明市經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: In the third part of our series on Vietnam, we switch the focus to a slum area of Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 專題第三集，鏡頭來到越南胡志明市平新郡的貧民區。

sentences.english: Big money is being made in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 河內和胡志明市正在創造巨大財富。

sentences.english: The city expected to see the fastest growth in its headcount of the superrich is Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 預計超級富豪人數增加最快的城市是胡志明市。

definition: Ho Chi Minh (1890-1969), former Vietnamese leader/see also 胡志明市[Hu2 Zhi4 ming2 Shi4]
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Yogyakarta, city of Java, Indonesia, and capital of the Special Region of Yogyakarta 日惹特區|日惹特区[Ri4 ye3 Te4 qu1]
